trans-unit.source: Represents information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Vonatkozó adatait jelöli egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain identifying information for an initialized recognition engine using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: Ezt úgy szerezheti be az inicializált felismerés motor az azonosító adatokat <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>a egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objektum vagy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>a egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektum.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The information returned in instances of RecognizerInfo obtained from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is determined by the settings in the **Speech Properties** member of the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Az információ nyert RecognizerInfo példányát vissza egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>határozza meg a beállításokat a **Beszéd tulajdonságai** tagja a **Vezérlőpult**.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: You can use instances of RecognizerInfo to construct a specific configuration of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: RecognizerInfo példányát használhatja összeállítani az adott konfigurációval <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>használatával a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29>konstruktor.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The static method <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> returns a list of all available <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations as RecognizerInfo instances.
trans-unit.target: A statikus metódus <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>az összes rendelkezésre álló listát ad vissza <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>konfigurációk RecognizerInfo példányként.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: További információk lekérdezi egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> containing information about the configuration of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Egy példányát adja vissza <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> konfigurációjával kapcsolatos adatokat tartalmazó egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A kulturális környezet által támogatott lekérdezi egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object can include the name of the culture, the associated language, the country/region, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektum nevét a kulturális környezet, a kapcsolódó nyelvi, az ország vagy régió, a használt naptár és dátumok formázásához és rendezheti karakterláncok lehetnek.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the culture supported by a given <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A kulturális környezet által támogatott információt ad vissza egy adott <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a leírása a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that describes the configuration for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Értéket ad vissza egy <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> , amely leírja, hogy egy adott konfigurációs <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the `RecognizerInfo` object.
trans-unit.target: Megválik az `RecognizerInfo` objektum.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a azonosítója egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: The identifier returned by the Id property is the same as the token name of the recognition engine in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Az Id tulajdonság által visszaadott azonosítója megegyezik a motor a Windows beállításjegyzékében jogkivonat neve.

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Egy adott azonosítóját adja vissza <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Gets the friendly name of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a rövid nevét egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Returns the friendly name for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Egy adott rövid nevét adja vissza <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio formats supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a hang által támogatott formátumokban egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of audio formats supported by a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Egy adott által támogatott hang formátumok listáját adja vissza <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> példány.
